name: Sniper Defense: Aliens
description:
If you needa attack, you should get this game! This game is fully prepared for a future world with UFOs, Spaceships and many other enemies on whom you attack and destroy them with your supernatural powers and a sniper that you aim at the enemies!

Select what type of level you want to play and accordingly, also select your enemies!

Play this simulation game and share your scores online with #SniperGamePlay!
